response.overview: Bihag ng Dialysis is a documentary that takes an intimate look into the lives of individuals undergoing dialysis, revealing the harsh realities of their daily battles. Through heartfelt interviews and raw, real-life footage, we explore not only the physical toll, emotional weight, and financial burden of dialysis but also the many restrictions it imposes on patients' lives. By contrasting the daily experiences of a healthy individual with those of someone undergoing dialysis, we highlight the stark differences in their freedoms, choices, and opportunities. While most people take simple activities for granted—eating without limits, traveling freely, or pursuing dreams without health constraints—dialysis patients must navigate a world of constant medical routines and sacrifices.
response.title: Bihag ng Dialysis
